entry.name: Alert
entry.value: A system generated message delivered within clinSIGHT or for some roles through email to inform the user of: 1) An activity they must perform. 2) Information on an activity that has taken place. 3) A reminder when an activity is overdue. (Reminder level 1). 4) A management notification of an activity that has not taken place. (Reminder level 2)

entry.name: BackWeb
entry.value: BackWeb is a software that enables web pages to be off-lined i.e. the pages are cached on the client system and provided to the user as if the system is still connected to the intranet. The client side plug-in determines intranet availability and ensures the pages are provided either directly from the server or from the client cache.

entry.name: Broadcast Alert
entry.value: An Alert generated from the Protocol Manager or the Operations Lead having information related to the study. Broadcast Alerts are the only manually generated alerts.

entry.name: clinSIGHT Library
entry.value: The Library is a dynamic repository of documentation and reports relating to a specific site. When a visit type is scheduled, the system retrieves current information for the scheduled visit and stores this information in the Library.

entry.name: Drug Reconciliation Worksheet (DRW)
entry.value: The form used to track the receipt and return of investigational product at the Investigator site.

entry.name: My Forms
entry.value: A tab in clinSIGHT where the user can see all forms they have generated for a site.

entry.name: On-Site Investigator File Form (OSIFF)
entry.value: This form is an electronic tracking form of the essential documents available in the on-site file. It will stay within clinSIGHT for the duration of the study.

entry.name: Potential Site Assessment Form (PSAF)
entry.value: The form completed by the Site Monitor in the New Site Identification process for potential sites to be considered for participation in future BMS clinical studies.

entry.name: Pre-Study Evaluation Form (PSEF)
entry.value: The PSEF following submission to clinSIGHT by the author.

entry.name: Pre-Study Evaluation Report (PSER)
entry.value: The form completed during the early study start up process for sites that are being considered for a current BMS clinical trial.

entry.name: Significant Ad-hoc Site Contact Form (SASCF)
entry.value: The Form used to capture information from site communications other than Pre-Study Evaluation, Initiation, Monitoring, and Closure Visits and when the contact with the clinical site is not recorded in Issue Management or Deviations.

entry.name: Significant Ad hoc Site Contact Report (SASCR)
entry.value: The report generated from the Significant Ad hoc Site Contact form.

entry.name: Site Closure Form (SCF)
entry.value: The form completed during a Site Closure Visit.

entry.name: Site Closure Report (SCR)
entry.value: The report generated from the Site Closure Form.

entry.name: Site Initiation Visit Form (SIVF)
entry.value: The form completed during the Site Initiation Visit.

entry.name: Site Initiation Visit Report (SIVR)
entry.value: The report generated from the Site Initiation Visit form.

entry.name: Site Monitoring Visit Form (SMVF)
entry.value: The form completed during a Site Monitoring Visit other than the PSE, SIV or closure visits.

entry.name: Site Monitoring Visit Report (SMVR)
entry.value: The report generated from the Site Monitoring Vsit Form.

entry.name: Structured Interview Text
entry.value: Created in the Site Monitor Plan and used to conduct a Phone Visit/Assessment. The text will serve as a prompt for further information while conducting the visit. It is available on the Site Monitor Visit Form on questions with a phone icon.

entry.name: User Roles
entry.value: clinSIGHT utilizes the roles as established in IMPACT to control access to studies, sites, homepages and reports. The roles are: DM - Data Manager, LD - Limited Database Administrator, LMM - Local Medical Monitor, MM - Medical Monitor, MSM - Manager Site Management, OPL - Operations Lea, PTM - Protocol Manager, SMM - Site Monitor Manager, SMN - Site Monitor, STM - Site Manager, USM - Unblinded Site Monitor, WRC - Worldwide Regulatory Compliance.
